name: df-rusgr
body: |- wceq(crusgr, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cusgr), wbr(cv(s0), crgr, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the "k-regular simple graph" predicate, which is true for a simple graph being k-regular: read ` G RegUSGraph K ` as ` G ` is a ` K `-regular simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Dec-2020.)
